page.title: 09 ONE DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: The alarm clock woke me at{7.00am. I showered and dressed before waking the children and going downstairs to prepare breakfast.Breakfast for myself consisted of Muesli,toast and a cup of tea.The girls had all left the house for school by{8.40am.}I continued with some household chores before leaving for work at{11.40am. I am at present working at Resolven Infants School,Nursery Class,where the children are aged 3-4 years old.Work finishes at{3.30pm}and I then travel home by car. Our tea{(main meal)}was ready by {4.45pm.}A friend called around{six}and we chatted over a cup of coffee about the forthcoming village carnival.She left around{8.00pm.}Then I did the last chore of the day,ironing the clothes I had washed earlier.At{11.30 I had a hot drink and went to bed.
